c74object.name: o.onebanggate
c74object.description: Filter the first item of an input stream of numbers.

inlet.description: Filters the first message received and after that o.onebanggate passes all input to its outlet.

outlet.description: Filters the first message after a reset, and sends all other messages to outlet.

method.name: bang
method.description: A bang in the right inlet resets o.onebanggate to filter the first input message again.

method.name: anything
method.description: If o.onebanggate is in its initial state (reset) it will pass all input messages to output except the first one.

entry.name: anything
entry.description: Messages received in the left inlet are passed out the outlet unless it is the first message received after onebanggate having been instantiated or reset (through bang on right inlet ).
